General.Name: Compagnie Industrielle et Financière d'Entreprises SA
General.Description: Compagnie Industrielle et Financière d'Entreprises SA operates as a construction company in France. It undertakes maritime and river, underwater, structures and civil engineering, buildings, and other special works. The company also develops real estate properties. Compagnie Industrielle et Financière d'Entreprises SA was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Saint-Herblain, France. The company is a subsidiary of Alfred de Musset SAS.

2.Name: Jean  Broch
